dict.acceptation: 投资，投资额；封锁；（时间、精力的）投入；值得买的东西；

sent.orig: The career education and training investment is one of important investment in human capital investment.
sent.trans: 职业教育培训投资是人力资本投资中很重要的一项投资。

sent.orig: Investment fund is an investment method or investment system.
sent.trans: 投资基金是一种投资方式或投资制度。

sent.orig: Investment estimate: Total investment is 248 million RMB, all or part of the investment.
sent.trans: 投资估算：该项目总投资估算2.48亿元人民币，全部或部分招商引资。

sent.orig: Financing company, investment company, investment bank and investment funds financing and investing for mid-small enterprises.
sent.trans: 经营主业BusinessScope:金融公司、投资公司、投资银行及投资基金为中小型企业融资和投资。

sent.orig: Investment estimate: Total investment is 178 million RMB, all or part of the investment.
sent.trans: 投资估算：该项目总投资估算1.78亿元人民币，全部或部分招商引资。
